Plot: Depicts the final twelve hours in the life of Jesus of Nazareth, on the day of his crucifixion in Jerusalem.
Title: The Passion of the Christ
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Maia Morgenstern, Christo Jivkov, Francesco De Vito
tomatoConsensus: The graphic details of Jesus' torture make the movie tough to sit through and obscure whatever message it is trying to convey.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 24 wins & 20 nominations.
